LanguageData.Aesthete.degreeDatas.0.label: aesthete
LanguageData.Aesthete.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves beautiful things, and really cares about how {PAWN_possessive} enviroment looks.
LanguageData.Bipolar.degreeDatas.0.label: bipolar
LanguageData.Bipolar.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is prone to extreme mood swings. When {PAWN_pronoun}'s happy, {PAWN_pronoun} can be very happy, but when {PAWN_pronoun}'s sad, {PAWN_pronoun} can become dangerously depressed.
LanguageData.BrownThumb.degreeDatas.0.label: brown thumb
LanguageData.BrownThumb.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a terrible gardener. The only thing {PAWN_pronoun} seems able to grow is weeds.
LanguageData.Butcher.degreeDatas.0.label: butcher
LanguageData.Butcher.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys preparing meat for cooking. {PAWN_possessive} butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if {PAWN_pronoun}'s dealing with animal corpses. {PAWN_pronoun}'s terrible with mechanoids.
LanguageData.Chemist.degreeDatas.0.label: chemist
LanguageData.Chemist.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a knack for organic chemistry, and is quite an efficient worker when brewing or producing drugs.
LanguageData.Claustrophobic.degreeDatas.0.label: claustrophobic
LanguageData.Claustrophobic.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is claustrophobic. {PAWN_pronoun} is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner.
LanguageData.ColdLover.degreeDatas.0.label: cold lover
LanguageData.ColdLover.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves colder temperatures. {PAWN_pronoun}'ll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot.
LanguageData.DeepSleeper.degreeDatas.0.label: deep sleeper
LanguageData.Gourmet.degreeDatas.0.label: gourmet
LanguageData.Gourmet.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a passion for food preparation. {PAWN_possessive} culinary creations are quite tasty, but {PAWN_pronoun} tends to take a while getting them "just right."
LanguageData.HeatLover.degreeDatas.0.label: heat lover
LanguageData.HeatLover.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves the heat. {PAWN_pronoun}'ll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold.
LanguageData.Aptitude.degreeDatas.0.label: inept
LanguageData.Aptitude.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_pronoun} means well, but {PAWN_nameDef} is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor.
LanguageData.Aptitude.degreeDatas.1.label: coordinated
LanguageData.Aptitude.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor.
LanguageData.PainThreshold.degreeDatas.0.label: ironman
LanguageData.PainThreshold.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. {PAWN_pronoun} is unlikely to be immobilized by it.
LanguageData.PainThreshold.degreeDatas.1.label: low pain tolerance
LanguageData.PainThreshold.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef} will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most.
LanguageData.Inventor.degreeDatas.0.label: inventor
LanguageData.Inventor.degreeDatas.0.description: Strange new ideas just appear in {PAWN_nameDef}'s mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to {PAWN_objective}, but {PAWN_pronoun} always seems distracted.
LanguageData.Eyesight.degreeDatas.0.label: near-sighted
LanguageData.Eyesight.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a hard time seeing things clearly unless {PAWN_pronoun} is relatively close to them.
LanguageData.Eyesight.degreeDatas.1.label: eagle-eyed
LanguageData.Eyesight.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets.
LanguageData.NeatFreak.degreeDatas.0.label: neat freak
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.0.label: nibbler
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} picks at {PAWN_possessive} food, taking extra time to finish {PAWN_possessive} meals.
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.1.label: glutton
LanguageData.EatingSpeed.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef} devours {PAWN_possessive} meals much faster than others.
LanguageData.Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.0.label: nyctophobe
LanguageData.Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is really afraid of the dark.
LanguageData.Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.1.label: nyctophile
LanguageData.Nyctophobe.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't fear the dark at all.
LanguageData.Perfectionist.degreeDatas.0.label: perfectionist
LanguageData.Perfectionist.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} refuses to accept less than {PAWN_possessive} best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. {PAWN_pronoun}'s less likely to fail when doing something, but {PAWN_pronoun} works slowly.
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.0.label: poor medic
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.0.description: Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. {PAWN_nameDef} is one of those people.
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.1.label: skilled medic
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef} seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in {PAWN_possessive} care will likely fare well.
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.2.label: master medic
LanguageData.Medic.degreeDatas.2.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between {PAWN_possessive} steady, skilled hands and {PAWN_possessive} inspiring bedside manner, patients in {PAWN_possessive} care will have little to fear.
LanguageData.Rockhound.degreeDatas.0.label: rockhound
LanguageData.Rockhound.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys working with rocks. {PAWN_possessive} mining speed is increased, but {PAWN_possessive} lack of interest in other areas slows {PAWN_objective} down when doing other jobs. And {PAWN_pronoun} hates working with plants.
LanguageData.Dodging.degreeDatas.0.label: sluggish
LanguageData.Dodging.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is not very good at getting out of the way of blows.
LanguageData.Dodging.degreeDatas.1.label: swift reflexes
LanguageData.Dodging.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks.
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.0.label: sucker
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. {PAWN_pronoun}'ll pay more than {PAWN_pronoun} should, and still think that {PAWN_pronoun} got a good deal.
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.1.label: haggler
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. {PAWN_pronoun} tends to get better prices than most people.
LanguageData.Trader.degreeDatas.2.label: master trader
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.0.label: careful shooter
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.0.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef} takes more time to aim when shooting. {PAWN_pronoun} shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.1.label: trigger-happy
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.1.descripti: Pew! Pew! Pew! {PAWN_nameDef} just likes pulling the trigger. {PAWN_pronoun} shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.2.label: deadshot
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.2.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef} knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately.
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.0.label: uncouth
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.0.description: Subtlety? Diplomacy? {PAWN_nameDef} barely even understands the meaning of the words.
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.1.label: diplomat
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef} knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.2.label: master diplomat
LanguageData.Diplomat.degreeDatas.2.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has such a way with words that {PAWN_pronoun} always manages to cool down a tense situation. {PAWN_pronoun} could talk for days and people would still listen.
LanguageData.Constitution.degreeDatas.0.label: weak constitution
LanguageData.Constitution.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
LanguageData.Constitution.degreeDatas.1.label: strong constitution
LanguageData.Constitution.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
